techmeme.title: Kraken launches Krak, a P2P payments app that lets users send funds across 110 countries using 300+ assets, including crypto, stablecoins, and fiat currencies (Ian Allison/CoinDesk)
Sources: DeepSeek's highly anticipated R2 model faces delays due to a shortage of Nvidia server chips in China, exacerbated by the US ban of Nvidia's H20 chips (The Information)
Marc Benioff says "AI is doing 30% to 50% of the work at Salesforce now", including software engineering and customer service (Bloomberg)
Sources: Apple execs discussed starting their own theatrical distribution unit; Warner Bros. is distributing the F1 movie and getting a share of the box office (Wall Street Journal)
Indonesia changes rules to require e-commerce platforms like TikTok Shop to withhold income tax from sellers, instead of asking sellers to pay the government (Grace Sihombing/Bloomberg)
